== Trivia ==
* Vajra is a legendary [[wikipedia:Vajra|ritualistic tool]] that symbolised the properties of a diamond and a thunderbolt. It was also the weapon of [[wikipedia:Indra|Indra]]. In East Asian culture, it is often synonymous with diamond/adamantine, and is said in Japanese as "kongō" (金剛).
